text: Ya tere liye sooney ka ek ghar ban jaye ya tu aasmaan par chadh jaye, aur tere chadne ka bhi hum yaqeen na karenge jab tak ke tu hamare upar ek aisi tehrir (written) na utaar laye jisey hum padhein”. (Aey Muhammad), insey kaho “paak hai mera parwardigar! Kya main ek paighaam laney waley Insaan ke siwa aur bhi kuch hoon?”
